Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in generating a parts list for a custom build PC. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to generate a parts list.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a parts list for the custom PC build using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question: What is your budget for this custom PC build?
What is the purpose of this custom PC build?
What are the performance requirements?
QApair.Answer: To be able to play Minecraft, League of Legends, Overwatch, Fortnite, etc.

QApair.Question: What is your preferred screen resolution?
Do you need a monitor?
Do you need a keyboard and mouse?
Do you need an operating system?
Do you have any preferred brands?
Do you need any other peripherals?
Do you have any other specific requirements?

Instances.Output:
CPU: Intel Core i5-7600K 3.8 GHz Quad-Core Processor
Motherboard: MSI Z270-A PRO ATX LGA1151 Motherboard
Memory: Corsair Vengeance LPX 16 GB (2 x 8 GB) DDR4-2400 Memory
Storage: Samsung 850 EVO-Series 250 GB 2.5" Solid State Drive
Video Card: MSI GeForce GTX 1060 6GB 6 GB GAMING X Video Card
Case: Corsair Carbide Series SPEC-04 ATX Mid Tower Case
Power Supply: Corsair RMx (2019) 750 W 80+ Gold Certified Fully Modular ATX Power Supply
Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Home OEM 64-bit
Monitor: LG 25UM58-P 25.0" 2560x1080 60 Hz Monitor
Keyboard: Corsair K55 RGB Gaming Keyboard
Mouse: Corsair Harpoon RGB Gaming Mouse
